author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-3871: SyncStrategy should use an executor for the threads it creates to request recoveries.
SOLR-3870: SyncStrategy should have a close so it can abort earlier on  shutdown.

author: sebb
msg: LANG-799 - DateUtils#parseDate uses default locale; add Locale support
Remove inappropriate test - we don't use localized formats

msg: rollback after vote got cancelled + add owb-impl and owb-web to tomcat plugins

author: olamy
msg: rss link when browsing an artifact

author: trawick
msg: The action-if-found is executed if *any* of the headers listed
are found, so only equivalent headers should be searched
with one invocation if action-if-found is used to flag success.
This catches an error such as missing prerror.h at at configure
time instead of at build time.
